modName: Sword Art Online - SAO - Dark Repulser
summary: The sword "Dark Repulser" from the anime "Sword Art Online".
descriptionHtml:
Hello everyone and welcome to my first ever upload to the Nexus. This mod adds the sword "Dark Repulser" from Sword Art Online. It is the sword Kirito uses in his left hand when he dual wields, which he had forged by Lisbeth. I did not see any mods for this weapon on the nexus or the workshop already so I decided the task should fall to me.

This is a first for me in literally every single category - My first model, my first texture, my first upload. I am by no means calling this a finished piece of work, but it is playable at this point and the Skyrim modding community so desperately needs a counterpart to the Elucidator right now.

With that said, I HIGHLY recommend using this mod in conjunction with Mr Flopsie's Elucidator mod, which you can find here : http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30368/?

It is as strong as a Dragonbone Sword. The sword can be crafted in-game by using ebony ingots and refined malachite. It can be tempered with additional refined malachite. It requires the Daedric Smithing perk to create and upgrade at double strength. These formulas are likely to change in the future when I am completely finished on the sword's appearance, and I will probably implement a method of making it craftable once per save. (For those who want to add it via the console, the id is xx000D63, where xx is the number of the mod in your load order.)

You can download and install it automatically with Nexus Mod Manager, or you can install manually by extracting the contents of the zip to your Skyrim data folder.

This mod now natively supports Dual Sheath Redux. If you don't use it, that's fine, just install the mod as usual and it will function normally. If you do, make sure to run DSR's patcher and use the updated plugin it gives you after installing this mod.
author: Fomortiis
